description.ko: 심해의 정적 속에서 유기적인 빛이 호흡하며 생명력을 불어넣는 리듬감 넘치는 춤입니다.
description.en: A rhythmic dance of organic light breathing life into the silent depths of the ocean.

prompt: An intricate spiral of bioluminescent kelp-like tendrils pulsing with deep emerald and pale yellow light, suspended in a dark abyssal trench. The liquid light flows through the translucent veins of the organic forms. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic textures, subsurface scattering on the membranes, volumetric lighting illuminating the floating particles, cinematic raytracing, and global illumination reflecting off the #2D5A3D and #7FB069 surfaces.
